title: 'Fake product'
body: Product is called bio neem-however I got fresh neem on the bottle. It was sealed-just a strip of plastic on the cover. Another thing I noticed was the ingredients were not mentioned on the back-whereas the original one has written ingredients. Stay away and don't buy this. Attached a pic of the fake bottle I received.

title: 'Shiny and smooth Hairs'
body: 'Works well for my hairs and giving it 5 start because it worths it'

title: 'Fake product Received - Worst Experience'
body: The media could not be loaded. I have received this product in March, and I started using it without properly inspecting the contents of the bottle. After four months of usage, I noticed heavy hair fall, which shocked me. I decided to search online and came across some YouTube videos. That's when I planned to check the key ingredients listed on the bottle. To my astonishment, there were no key ingredient details on the bottle, and the content alignment was completely different. It was then that I realized I had received a fake product. I have attached a video of the bottle I received, clearly showing the absence of key ingredient information.  I urge Amazon to take serious action against the vendor. It is essential for people who are considering buying this product to thoroughly check whether it's original or fake by examining the bottle's contents.

title: 'Failed!! Does the opposite.'
